name: Nineteen58
description: Nineteen58 builds advanced AI agents that handle real customer interactions across voice, WhatsApp, and chat. Our agents act as digital representatives — managing sales, support, and collections — with the ability to learn over time, handle multi-channel conversations, and escalate when needed. We provide persistent, objective-driven AI agents backed by a powerful orchestration platform that ensures human-like conversations while maintaining strict control and compliance.
focus_areas: AI-powered customer engagement and automation across voice, WhatsApp, and chat.
